verses.roman:
prabhu premāveśe karena gāna, nartana
kabhu bhāvāveśe rāsa-līlānukaraṇa

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; karena—does; gāna—singing; nartana—dancing; kabhu—sometimes; bhāva-āveśe—in ecstatic emotion; rāsa-līlā—the rāsa-līlā dance; anukaraṇa—imitating.
translation: He sang and danced in ecstatic love and sometimes imitated the rāsa dance in emotional ecstasy.
